title: Google Pixel 3 dies around 40% battery
content:
My phone started dying around 40% after almost one and a half year of normal usage. Never played any games or watched many videos or stuff. Just photos and normal chat apps. From 40% it suddenly drops to 14%, then in a matter of seconds to 5, 3 ,1 and 0%.
I have tried to reset it to factory settings, it didnt't work. There's also no app that eats too much battery.

What can I do?
